DOC.brief_summary: The study will evaluate the effectiveness and safety of multiple dosing regimens of IV conivaptan in subjects with euvolemic or hypervolemic hyponatremia
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Multiple Dosing Regimens of IV Conivaptan in Subjects With Euvolemic or Hypervolemic Hyponatremia
DOC.criteria: Subject has a serum sodium value between 115 and 133 mEq/L Subject is euvolemic or hypervolemic Clinical evidence of volume depletion or dehydration Uncontrolled brady or tachyarrhythmias requiring emergent pacemaker placement or treatment
